column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I prefer my egg runny
column2: and the broth my ramen is in to be much more flavorful. I mean
column3: the reason why you dine out for ramen is because of the broth
column4: this place just didn't get it right
column5: which is a huge let down seeing how ramen is their specialty.  According to a few of the people in my group of 6
column6: this place isn't consistant with their quality.
